# Android App Requirements

**Date**: 4 de fevereiro de 2026

## Project Overview
Creating an Android application for machine maintenance.

## Technical Constraints

### Framework
- **Preference**: None specified
- **Flexibility**: Open to any appropriate Android development framework

### Current Status
- Rough idea of the app concept exists
- UI/UX vision is forming
- Detailed specifications to be determined

### Build Requirements
- **Critical**: The final APK package MUST be buildable on Jenkins
- Build process must be automated and CI/CD compatible
- Jenkins pipeline configuration will be required

## Project Stage
- Initial planning phase
- Requirements gathering in progress
- Framework and architecture decisions pending
